DOC.detailed_description: Successful embryo implantation vitro fertilization require healthy embryos receptive endometrium . The window implantation ( WOI ) , endometrium reach receptive state , varies among individual . Displacements WOI report major cause repeat implantation failure . However , reliable diagnostic metric evaluate endometrial receptive status lacking . The propose study use single-cell RNA seq bioinformatics tool develop high-resolution platform characterize endometrium activity measure endometrial receptive state non-invasive manner . First objective develop experimental pipeline generate high quality single-cell RNA-seq data endometrial biopsy endometrial fluid healthy patient throughout menstrual cycle stage : early proliferative ( EP ; day 0-8 ) , late proliferative ( LP ; day 9-14 ) , early secretory ( ES ; day 15-18 ) , mid-secretory receptive ( MS ; day 19-23 ) , late secretory ( LS ; day 24-30 ) . These tissue dissociate mechanically enzymatically subject microfluidic sorting , single cell transcriptome amplification analysis . These data provide first transcriptome-wide single cell data various cell type human endometrium . Secondly , study look establish algorithmic model distinguish epithelial stroma population informatically , without need first purify population interest . This enable transcriptome analysis mixed population cell . DOC.criteria: Healthy woman natural cycle ; Normal karyotype ; Negative serologic test HIV , HBV , HCV , RPR ; BMI : 18 30 Kg/m2 ( include ) ; Women regular menstrual cycle ( 34/2830 day ) . Patients carry intrauterine device previous 3 month ; Patients take hormonal contraceptive previous 2 month ; Adnexal uterine pathology ; Polycystic ovary ; Any unstable disease medical condition could interfere study put risk health patient ( evaluate principal researcher research team ) ; Any illness medical unstable condition .
